/*
 * This file is generated using typical-template.
 */
package examples.inner

import examples.inner.InnerModel

/**
 * Generate the content for the template InnerRenderer filled up
 * with the content of the passed models.
 */
object InnerRenderer {

    fun renderTemplate(innerModel: InnerModel): String {
        return """
          |
          |
          |${ if(innerModel.isEnabled()) { """
              |    fun isActive(): Boolean = true
              |
          """ } else { """
          """ } }
          |
          |
          |
          |    fun innerMethod(): String {
          |        return "inner"
          |    }
          |
          |
        """.trimMargin(marginPrefix = "|")
    }

    fun filePath(innerModel: InnerModel): String {
      return "dummy-dir/inner.txt"
    }
}
